headline: Kimco Realty® Receives Nareit’s 2024 Retail Leader in the Light Award
summary: JERICHO, N.Y., Nov. 20, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Kimco Realty® (NYSE: KIM), a real estate investment trust (REIT) and a leading owner and operator of high-quality, open-air, grocery-anchored shopping centers, and mixed-use assets in the United States, today announced it has received Nareit’s 2024 Leader in the Light Award for Retail for the third consecutive year, marking the fifth time overall that the company has received this prestigious recognition for its sustainability initiatives.
